name: Browser Update Ribbon
author: duckinformatica, gab.lau, whiletrue

sections.description:
Puts a ribbon on the website if the user browser is older than expected.

Minimum browser versions are customizable in the Settings menu, along with the title and a custom link.
Now you can set the position and the image of the ribbon.
This plugin has full support for translation into other languages

For more informations: http://www.duckinformatica.it/prodotti-e-servizi/free-wordpress-plugins/

This plugin uses the Browser detection library built by [Chris Schuld] https://github.com/cbschuld/Browser.php
sections.installation:
1. Upload the browser-update-ribbon directory into the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Set your favourite options in the Settings->Update Ribbon menu in WordPress
  4. Enjoy!
sections.changelog:
1.4.3

18-01-2016

  • Changed: Default minimum browser versions (IE11, FF43, CH47, S9, O34, E12)
  • Compatibility to WP 4.4

1.4.2

27-10-2015

  • Added: Screenshots
  • Changed: Default minimum browser versions (IE11, FF41, CH46, S9, O32, E12)
  • Fixed: Small fix

1.4.1

11-09-2015

  • Changed: Default minimum browser versions (IE11, FF40, CH45, S8, O31, E12)
  • Fixed: Small fix

1.4.0

21-08-2015

  • Changed: Default minimum browser versions (IE11, FF40, CH44, S8, O31, E12)
  • Added: Position of the Ribbon (Top Left, Top Right, Bottom Left, Bottom Right)
  • Added: Custom Ribbon image
  • Added: New Edge Browser detection
  • Added: Localizzation support
  • Added: Translation Italian (it_IT)
  • Changed: Update compatibility with WordPress 4.3

1.3.1

25-07-2014

  • Changed: Default minimum browser versions (IE11, FF31, CH36, S7, O23)
  • Changed: Update Browser detection library to 1.9 version
  • Changed: Update compatibility with WordPress 3.9.1

1.3.0

17-01-2014

  • Changed: Default minimum browser versions
  • Changed: Update Browser detection library (2013-12-13)
  • Added: Enable homepage only mode (shows only in homepage)

1.2.2

15-04-2013

  • Changed: Default minimum browser versions

1.2.1

30-07-2012

  • Added: More info in the debug string
  • Fixed: Opera version 12 detection

1.2

04-06-2012

  • Added: Link target customization (same window, new window)

1.1

19-03-2012

  • Fixed: Transparent background for ribbon image (fix for IE old versions)

1.0

12-03-2012

  • Initial release
